body.p: The disclosures require amounts to be presented in a tabular format (ie a table) unless another format is more appropriate. The boards believe that a tabular format best conveys an overall understanding of the effect of any rights of set‑off and other related arrangements on an entity’s financial position and improves the transparency of such information.
